text: haey phokophl robsa ke trauv vineasa haey ke ban teahdai teang pir robsa ke( daoy kar saokasday) towleu avei delke ban chamnay champoh vea( chamkar) khn del chonlong teangoasa robsa vea trauv bamphlanh . haey ke ban niyeay tha ao anichchea khluon khnhom. khnhom minban yk anaknea mneak thveuchea daikou korp sakkar ruom cheamuoynung mcheasa robsakhnhom laey
